about_the_game:
Game Features

Choose one hero from two characters.

Knight: A fighter who is good at physical close combat and archery. She is proficient in elemental magic and can manipulate fire. Her combat skills include using lightning to stun and knockdown enemies to gain an edge in close combat.

Ranger: She sacrifices her physical combat ability, but she can manipulate fire and ice, build turrets, and even summon battle pets to support the battle.

Defeating the big devil in the deep forest will be quite challenging.

You need to defeat small monsters to level up and defeat the big devil through continuous fighting and exploration.

During the fight, don't forget to save and load your game progress at any time to avoid having to level up again from scratch.
detailed_description:
Game Features

Choose one hero from two characters.

Knight: A fighter who is good at physical close combat and archery. She is proficient in elemental magic and can manipulate fire. Her combat skills include using lightning to stun and knockdown enemies to gain an edge in close combat.

Ranger: She sacrifices her physical combat ability, but she can manipulate fire and ice, build turrets, and even summon battle pets to support the battle.

Defeating the big devil in the deep forest will be quite challenging.

You need to defeat small monsters to level up and defeat the big devil through continuous fighting and exploration.

During the fight, don't forget to save and load your game progress at any time to avoid having to level up again from scratch.
name: Valley of Stars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10, Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10, Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to this little Valley of Stars! Select your hero and start the battle. Defeat the big devil in the deep forest...
